issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Blue line appears under tabs in tabgroup.

Steps to reproduce:
1)Create Classic two tabbed application and launch on android device.

Actual Result:
1)Blue line appears under tabs.

Expected Result:
1)No blue line should appear unless any color defined.


This is an observation hence logged the bug since this does not occur in 3.1.3.GA
So if this is a bug then its a regression as issue does not occur in 3.1.3.GA
fields.summary: Android:Blue line appears under tabs in tabgroup

titanium: 3.2.0-beta

Device: Google Nexus7(v4.3)

comments.body: Closing as per above comments and behaviour change reproduce due to android architecture change.
